title: Strengthening Programming Practical Skills: Flipped Learning Physics Education Course Based on Engineering Design

context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the physical problem-solving process using the five stages of the Engineering Design Process (EDP): problem definition, research, design, production, and evaluation.
Learners can master core physics concepts (inertia, energy, force, etc.) with over 80% proficiency by analyzing pre-learning materials in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can implement engineering design outcomes through team-based projects and evaluate performance based on scientific evidence.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
